item.title: Nutricircle Ltd Stock Hits Record High of Rs.383.95 on 30 Dec 2025
item.description: Nutricircle Ltd reached a new all-time high of Rs.383.95 on 30 Dec 2025, capping a sustained rally that has seen the stock surge over 63% in the past month alone. This milestone reflects the company’s robust price momentum and strong market performance relative to benchmarks. Time: 21 minutes ago

item.title: Choice International Ltd Stock Hits All-Time High at Rs.841.2
item.description: Choice International Ltd, a prominent holding company, achieved a significant milestone on 30 Dec 2025 by reaching an all-time high stock price of Rs.841.2. This new peak underscores the company’s sustained strong performance across multiple time horizons, outpacing both its sector and the broader market indices. Time: 24 minutes ago

item.title: National Peroxide Ltd Stock Hits All-Time Low Amid Prolonged Downtrend
item.description: National Peroxide Ltd’s shares plunged to a new all-time low of Rs.462.05 on 30 Dec 2025, marking a significant milestone in the stock’s extended period of decline. The commodity chemicals company has experienced sustained negative returns across multiple time frames, reflecting ongoing pressures within its financial and market performance. Time: 28 minutes ago

item.title: Mazagon Dock Shipbuilders Ltd Hits Intraday Low Amid Price Pressure
item.description: Mazagon Dock Shipbuilders Ltd experienced a notable decline today, touching an intraday low of Rs 2,460, reflecting a 3.07% drop as the stock faced significant price pressure amid broader market softness and sector underperformance. Time: 32 minutes ago

item.title: Lloyds Metals & Energy Ltd Hits Intraday Low Amid Price Pressure
item.description: Lloyds Metals & Energy Ltd experienced a notable intraday decline on 30 Dec 2025, touching a low of Rs 1313, down 5.4% from its previous close. The stock underperformed its sector and broader market indices, reflecting immediate price pressures and subdued market sentiment within the ferrous metals segment. Time: 33 minutes ago

item.title: Norben Tea & Exports Ltd Hits New 52-Week High at Rs.91.1
item.description: Norben Tea & Exports Ltd has surged to a fresh 52-week and all-time high of Rs.91.1, marking a significant milestone in its stock performance. This new peak reflects strong momentum driven by sustained gains over recent sessions and robust relative strength within the FMCG sector. Time: 55 minutes ago

item.title: Destiny Logistics & Infra Ltd Hits Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure
item.description: Destiny Logistics & Infra Ltd, a micro-cap player in the transport services sector, witnessed a sharp decline on 30 Dec 2025, hitting its lower circuit limit of ₹112.35. The stock plunged by 4.99%, underperforming its sector and broader market benchmarks amid intense selling pressure and panic among investors. Time: 56 minutes ago

item.title: Orient Technologies Ltd Surges on Heavy Value Trading and Institutional Interest
item.description: Orient Technologies Ltd (ORIENTTECH), a key player in the Computers - Software & Consulting sector, witnessed a remarkable surge in trading activity on 30 Dec 2025, driven by substantial value turnover and renewed institutional interest. The stock outperformed its sector and broader market indices, reflecting a significant shift in investor sentiment and technical momentum. Time: 56 minutes ago

item.title: PVP Ventures Ltd Hits Upper Circuit Amid Strong Buying Pressure
item.description: PVP Ventures Ltd, a micro-cap player in the realty sector, surged to hit its upper circuit limit on 30 Dec 2025, propelled by robust buying interest and significant unfilled demand. The stock outperformed its sector and benchmark indices, signalling renewed investor confidence despite a recent downgrade in its mojo rating. Time: 56 minutes ago

item.title: Angel One Ltd Sees Heavy Put Option Activity Amid Bearish Market Sentiment
item.description: Angel One Ltd, a key player in the capital markets sector, has witnessed significant put option trading activity as bearish sentiment intensifies. The stock’s recent underperformance, coupled with a surge in put contracts at the 2300 strike price expiring on 30 Dec 2025, signals growing investor caution and hedging strategies amid a challenging market environment. Time: 56 minutes ago

item.title: Maruti Suzuki Sees Robust Call Option Activity Amid Bullish Market Sentiment
item.description: Maruti Suzuki India Ltd (NSE: MARUTI) has witnessed significant call option trading activity on 30 Dec 2025, signalling a bullish stance among market participants. The surge in contracts at strike prices near the current underlying value reflects investor optimism, supported by the stock’s recent technical strength and sector-aligned performance. Time: 56 minutes ago

item.title: Paradeep Phosphates Ltd Sees Robust Trading Activity Amid Sector Outperformance
item.description: Paradeep Phosphates Ltd (PARADEEP), a key player in the fertilisers sector, has emerged as one of the most actively traded stocks by value on 30 Dec 2025, reflecting heightened investor interest and strong institutional participation. item.title: Jet Freight Logistics Ltd Hits Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure
item.description: Jet Freight Logistics Ltd, a micro-cap player in the transport services sector, witnessed intense selling pressure on 30 Dec 2025, culminating in the stock hitting its lower circuit limit. The share price declined sharply by 4.05%, marking its maximum daily loss in recent sessions and reflecting mounting investor concerns amid a sustained downtrend. Time: 56 minutes ago

item.title: BSE Ltd Sees Heavy Put Option Activity Amid Bearish Sentiment
item.description: BSE Ltd, a key player in the capital markets sector, has witnessed significant put option trading activity, signalling a cautious or bearish stance among investors ahead of the January 2026 expiry. Despite a modest decline in its share price, the surge in put contracts at the ₹2,500 strike price highlights growing hedging strategies and speculative positioning in the stock. Time: 56 minutes ago

item.title: Mahindra & Mahindra Ltd Sees Robust Call Option Activity Amid Bullish Market Sentiment
item.description: Mahindra & Mahindra Ltd (M&M) has emerged as one of the most actively traded stocks in the call options segment on 30 Dec 2025, signalling strong bullish positioning among investors. item.title: JBM Auto Ltd Sees Robust Value Trading Amid Mixed Technical Signals
item.description: JBM Auto Ltd (JBMA) emerged as one of the most actively traded stocks by value on 30 Dec 2025, registering a significant intraday rally that outpaced its sector and benchmark indices. Despite a recent downgrade to a Strong Sell rating by MarketsMOJO, the stock demonstrated notable resilience with a 3.96% gain and strong institutional interest, reflecting a complex market dynamic in the auto components sector. item.title: GTL Infrastructure Ltd Sees Exceptional Volume Amidst Bearish Momentum
item.description: GTL Infrastructure Ltd (GTLINFRA) emerged as one of the most actively traded stocks on 30 Dec 2025, registering a staggering volume of over 1.58 crore shares. Despite this surge in trading activity, the stock’s price movement remained subdued, reflecting ongoing bearish sentiment and a strong sell rating from MarketsMOJO. Time: 56 minutes ago

item.title: GVK Power & Infrastructure Ltd Hits Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure
item.description: Shares of GVK Power & Infrastructure Ltd plunged to their lower circuit limit on 30 Dec 2025, succumbing to intense selling pressure that saw the stock close at ₹3.07, down 1.92% on the day. The micro-cap construction firm’s stock has been under sustained bearish momentum, reflecting investor concerns amid deteriorating fundamentals and weak market sentiment. Time: 56 minutes ago

item.title: Sensex Edges Lower as Mid and Small Caps Weaken; Auto Sector Leads Gains
item.description: The Indian equity market closed the penultimate trading session of 2025 on a subdued note, with the Sensex marginally retreating by 37.85 points (-0.04%) to 84,657.69. Despite a cautious global backdrop and mixed sectoral performances, select pockets such as the automobile sector demonstrated resilience, while broader market breadth remained weak, reflecting investor caution ahead of the new year. Time: 56 minutes ago
